personal.name: Davron Rustamov
personal.title: PR Manager
personal.bio: Experienced PR Manager with a strong background in media relations, branding, and strategic communications. Specialized in building and maintaining positive public image for organizations across various industries.
personal.description: I am a dedicated PR professional with expertise in media relations, brand management, and strategic communications. My experience spans across multiple organizations, including NWORK International Company, where I've managed professional practices at leading media outlets such as Championat Asia, Ishонч, O'zbekiston 24, and the Department of Protected Natural Areas.

education.description: Completed primary and secondary education with focus on communication and media studies.
Pursuing degree in Journalism & Mass Communication, developing expertise in media relations, public relations, and strategic communications.

experience.description: Leading public relations and media strategy for international operations.

practices.description: Managed PR campaigns and media relations for sports media platform.
Developed and executed communication strategies for media outlet.
Led public relations initiatives for national media organization.
Managed communications and public awareness campaigns for environmental protection.
